QuestData.Title: Haven't Got Time For the Pain
QuestData.Description:
Ugh... One moment...
My first assignment... Unstable temporal energy seeping into the forest... Affecting the wildlife... Need to assess the impact and collect that magic for the Timewalkers...
<Zera shakes her head a moment.>
I was examining a pack of vorquin when I was attacked by a crazed bear overflowing with time magic. It caught me off guard. I barely escaped.
Could you find my missing gear for me, $c? Uh, you might also have to deal with that bear.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Timewalker Staff, Timewalker Notes, and slay the Crazed Alpha in the Flowing Forest of Thaldraszus.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, for recovering all that valuable equipment $c.
